capitalContribution.twoDecimalPlaces: Value must be a number with 2 decimal places
capitalContribution.noSymbols: Value must not include currency symbols like £, $ and €
capitalContribution.noComma: Value must not include a comma
capitalContribution.atLeastOneType: Select at least one type of contribution
capitalContribution.currencyRequired: Select the currency of the capital contribution

confirm.countryMissing: We cannot identify the country for this address. Select Change, then select the country.

dateOfUpdate.registeredOfficeAddress: Date the registered office address changed must be the same as or after limited partnership's registration date
dateOfUpdate.principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress: Date the principal place of business changed must be the same as or after limited partnership's registration date
dateOfUpdate.partnershipName: Date the partnership name changed must be the same as or after limited partnership's registration date
dateOfUpdate.term: Date the term changed must be the same as or after limited partnership's registration date
